decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size: 14px;">The proposed rear extension, by reason of its siting, scale and design would result in an incongruous development that would be overly prominent and disrupt the character of the terrace. The proposal, therefore, fails to comply with policies D3 (</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and D4(</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Delivering Good Design) of the London Plan (2021) and Policy LP1 (</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">Design, Quality and Local Character) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and the </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Extensions and Alterations 2009.</span></p>

<p>The proposed windows to the side elevation of the two storey rear addition by virtue of their design and siting would constitute an incompatible form of development which would fail to have regard to the character of the host building or surrounding area. The proposal, therefore, fails to comply with policies D3 (<span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) and D4(</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">Delivering Good Design) of the London Plan (2021) and Policy LP1 (</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">Design, Quality and Local Character) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and the </span>&nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Extensions and Alterations 2009.</p>
description: Erection of a roof extension with 1x rooflight and installation of 2x rooflights on the roof of existing loft conversion.
